name: James Lao
bio: I write mostly C# professionally, but I have a passion for functional programming and lately Rust. I look forward to helping you anyway I can!

name: Choon-Siang Lai
bio: Writes Javascript/ES and Python at work, discovered Rust and find it expressive despite being a system langauge. Would love to contribute back by mentoring.

name: Jon Gjengset
bio: I'm PhD student at MIT CSAIL where I work on a research database written in Rust. I also do regular Rust live-coding streams.
